defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Contractor liable for workmanship only; pre-existing plumbing is utility/customer
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Define criteria, documentation, response time, and claim workflow

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.

pricingRiskByCategory.pricingDrivers: No/partial asset data forces survey labor or conservative production rates

defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Assume data is partial unless proven otherwise; include survey/add-alternate or contingency
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Require sample extract + data dictionary + accuracy statement; align change control to data defects

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.

pricingRiskByCategory.pricingDrivers: Who owns scheduling drives staffing, call center cost, failure rate

defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Assume contractor-led scheduling is required for performance; price call center if unknown
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Define roles, outreach plan, and utility support actions

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.

pricingRiskByCategory.pricingDrivers: If contractor must validate everything, price rises (survey + failed installs)

defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Assume data requires validation; trigger survey recommendation and explicit exception workflow
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Contract language: who owns data accuracy, what happens when it is wrong, and how exceptions are paid

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.

pricingRiskByCategory.pricingDrivers: No master file = manual build of work orders, high admin cost

defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Assume master file exists but may be incomplete; require sample and refresh plan
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Require sample extract, cadence, transfer method, and defect process

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.

pricingRiskByCategory.pricingDrivers: If curb stop/valves are unreliable, installs slow and risk skyrockets

defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Assume interior valve preferred with curb stop backup; require curb stop authorization clarity
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Define isolation method, backup plan, and who responds when isolation fails

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.

pricingRiskByCategory.pricingDrivers: Prevailing wage / Davis-Bacon / PLA / union requirements can swing unit pricing materially

defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Assume prevailing wage / compliance unknown; carry contingency and require disclosure pre-award
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Require explicit labor compliance language and funding source disclosure early

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.

pricingRiskByCategory.pricingDrivers: No protection forces repeated revisits and kills production

defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Assume contractor must be allowed to advance when blocked by utility delays
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Add progression rule: unresolved RTU/UIR does not block new routes after documentation

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.

pricingRiskByCategory.pricingDrivers: If contractor eats comm failures, bids get padded

defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Assume ownership is case-by-case unless clarified; flag as major commercial risk
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Separate install workmanship vs system/material constraints; set responsibility boundaries

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.

pricingRiskByCategory.pricingDrivers: No authorization creates abandonments and revisits; yes creates material + labor costs

defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Assume not authorized unless defined; include contingency line item if unknown
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Define decision tree: replace under allowance vs utility responsibility

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.

pricingRiskByCategory.pricingDrivers: Survey cost vs embedding contingency into unit price

defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Assume limited survey required if data uncertainty exists; propose optional add-alternate
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Define survey scope, deliverables, acceptance, and how survey results adjust quantities

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.

pricingRiskByCategory.pricingDrivers: Undefined RTU = contractor absorbs out-of-scope time unless paid

defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Assume RTU exists; require formal disposition + commercial treatment
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Define RTU reasons, documentation, and payment rules (attempt fee or unit credit)

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.

pricingRiskByCategory.pricingDrivers: Hard gating thresholds reduce productivity and increase revisits

defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Assume gating exists unless explicitly denied; require progression protection language
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Define closure dispositions + allow advance when remaining are RTU/UIR/no-access

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.

pricingRiskByCategory.pricingDrivers: Call center is a real cost center; pretending otherwise is expensive

defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Assume call center needed for meaningful indoor volume; include in pricing if undefined
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Define staffing hours, channels, language needs, and dispatch authority

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.

pricingRiskByCategory.pricingDrivers: UIR delays create idle time, route churn, remobilization

defaultsIfUnanswered.ifUnansweredAssumption: Assume UIR occurs; require SLA/response windows or progression protection
defaultsIfUnanswered.mitigationGuidance: Define utility action SLA and contractor right to advance

pricingRiskByCategory.recommendedQualifiers: Clarify this item in RFP/addendum or pre-award Q and A; if unresolved, carry contingency and define change-control triggers.
